name: GTDB Guitar Tuners
author: Ben Taylor

sections.description:
Over 1700+ guitar tuners available.

Examples:

EADGBE – [gtdb tuner=”eadgbe”]

CFCGA#E – [gtdb tuner=”cfcgase”]

DADGAD with a strum button
[gtdb tuner=”dadgad” strummer=”1″]

DADGAD with a strum button and label for button
[gtdb tuner=”dadgad” strummer=”1″ strummer_label=”Play DADGAD”]

DADGAD with a custom css class for the button
[gtdb tuner=”dadgad” strummer=”1″ strummer_class=”custom-strum-btn”]

9 String guitar tuner example with strumming and a label
[gtdb tuner=”csfsbeadgbe” strummer=”1″ strummer_label=”Play Guitar Tuning”]

Current Available Tuners: 1700+

For instructions and demo goto
https://swaziweb.co.za/wordpress-plugin-guitar-tuner/
https://swaziweb.co.za/wordpress-plugin-guitar-tuner/

short_description: Embed 6 to 9 string guitar tuners on your pages using short codes. Now accepts mutilple instances per page
